title: Illaoi cost bug?
body: Says 7800ip like normal, but took like 12k when purchased? was on a little over 23k IP now on 11k IP after buying her, anyone else have this happen?

replies.body:
Hey Terragaia,

This may be a visual glitch. Can you try restarting your client and see if the correct balance appears afterwards?
ok yeah the display is showing the appropriate amount now tyvm, thought i lost an additional 5k ip for nothing haha
